tool_description: Shows climate related reports from different newspaper
title: climates

api_list.name: Get climate news from different news website
api_list.description: Getting news from a particular website
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climates.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climates.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all climate news
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all climate change report.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climates.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climates.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
